executable.title: BRAINS Probability Labels
executable.description: This program calculates the probability of each label across a list of surfaces when the flag "probability" is ON and the most likely labels (assign each point with the highest probability label across surfaces) when the flag "mostLikely" is ON.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568
